tool_description: The Worldwide Hotels API is a powerful and versatile tool that provides developers with seamless access to an extensive database of hotels from around the globe. With easy-to-use endpoints, this API enables users to retrieve detailed information about hotels, including their locations, amenities, room availability, pricing, and more. Whether you're building travel applications, booking platforms, or simply enhancing your services with hotel data, the Worldwide Hotels API offers a comprehensiv...
name: Worldwide Hotels
title: Worldwide Hotels

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://worldwide-hotels.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "worldwide-hotels.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
